TopicTitle: Orbital Drift Compensation Not Working With Manuever Nodes?

Articles.Content:
Well, as the title suggestions, it seems to me that manuever nodes are moving around. Not the nodes themselves, but the manuever marker on the nav ball and the manuever node's projected orbit.

I am playing with mods. I didn't notice this happen around Kerbin, but it started being very noticeable when I got to the Mun.
